textAfterTable: Droog Radio DJs:  NickStropko Listen on Summer 2012 at: Wednesday 8-10pm Listen on Fall 2012 at: Thursday 9:30-11am Listen on Spring 2012 at: Thursday 8-10pm Listen on Winter 2012 at: Tuesday 8-10pm Listen on Spring 2011 at: Wednesday 1-3am Listen on Fall 2011 at: Tuesday 8-10pm Listen on Winter 2011 at: Wednesday 2-4pm Hey droogie, care to listen to the most horrorshow radio show in Philly?
